Title: Militants Kill Seven Paramilitary Troops in Southwestern Pakistan
Description: Islam Times - Militants stormed a paramilitary checkpoint in southwestern Pakistan on Saturday, killing seven troops, the latest in a string of attacks by separatist insurgents, police said.

Title: Britain Should Align with US on Trade Rather than Pursue EU, Says Trump Aide
Description: Islam Times - A senior economic adviser to US President-elect Donald Trump said Britain should align itself with the US on trade rather than pursue closer ties with the European Union (EU).

Title: Police Detain Several Protesters near CEC Building in Tbilisi
Description: Islam Times - Law enforcers detained several protesters who tried to block the road near the Central Election Commission building in Tbilisi, Georgia.

Title: Trump Says Interior Pick Burgum Will Chair New National Energy Council
Description: Islam Times - US President-elect Donald Trump said on Friday that he was creating a National Energy Council to coordinate policies to boost US energy production that will be led by his pick for interior secretary, North Dakota Governor Doug Burgum.

Title: Spokesman Denies Story That Musk Met with Iran’s UN Envoy
Description: Islam Times - The spokesperson for the Iranian Foreign Ministry denied a report by the New York Times that Iran’s ambassador to the United Nations and Elon Musk, the world’s wealthiest person and a close ally of US President-elect Donald Trump, have met in New York.

Title: Trump’s Paradoxes: The Unlikely Alliances of Evangelicals, White Nationalists, and the Jewish-American Divide
Description: Islam Times - Donald Trump’s presidency highlighted a complex intersection of ideologies, revealing contradictions and controversies while attracting two starkly different groups. His inflammatory statements and legal troubles have sparked widespread debate. Trump's appeal to seemingly opposing factions—Evangelicals who support 'Israel' and white nationalists who harbor animosity towards it—underscores the paradoxes of his political journey. Additionally, his polarizing figure has alienated significant portions of the Jewish-American community. The ramifications of his behavior, including allegations of 'sexual' misconduct and questionable public health advice during the COVID-19 pandemic, further reveal a character that continues to perplex many.

Title: UN Urges 'Israel' to Grant Unrestricted Humanitarian Access to Gaza
Description: Islam Times - The United Nations has called on the 'Israeli' entity to grant unrestricted access to the Gaza Strip to facilitate the delivery of vital humanitarian aid.

Title: US Weapons Official Expresses Alarm over Yemen’s Growing Military Capabilities
Description: Islam Times - The top US official overseeing military acquisitions has voiced surprise at the advanced firepower demonstrated by Yemen’s Armed Forces in their operations against the 'Israeli' entity and its allies.

Title: Israel Intensifies Strikes on Beirut’s Southern Suburbs
Description: Islam Times - Israel launched heavy airstrikes on Beirut’s Haret Hreik neighborhood Friday, as Lebanese media reported significant destruction to residential buildings amid mounting regional tensions.

Title: WHO Chief Condemns Israel’s Killing of 12 Paramedics in Lebanon Strike
Description: Islam Times - World Health Organization (WHO) Director General Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus has condemned an Israeli airstrike on a Lebanese civil defense center that killed at least 12 paramedics, calling it part of a disturbing trend of attacks on healthcare during conflicts.

Title: Democratic Senators Demand Musk Be Probed for Russia Ties
Description: Islam Times - SpaceX CEO Elon Musk should be investigated over media claims that he communicated with several senior Russian officials in recent years, two top Democratic senators have demanded in a letter.

Title: Dutch Government Crisis Defused, Prime Minister Says
Description: Islam Times - A government crisis in the Netherlands was avoided in a tense emergency meeting on Friday, as a cabinet member resigned over the government's handling of violence involving fans of an Israeli soccer team in Amsterdam last week.

Title: Spanish Regional Leader Admits Mistakes Made in Flood Response, But Refuses to Step Down
Description: Islam Times - The Spanish regional leader facing immense pressure for his handling of the catastrophic Valencia floods last month defied calls to step down Friday, but conceded that authorities made mistakes in their response to the disaster.

Title: Putin-Scholz Phone Conversation Was Arranged Promptly: Kremlin Spokesman
Description: Islam Times - Germany’s request for a phone conversation between Russian President Vladimir Putin and German Chancellor Olaf Scholz was processed by the Kremlin promptly, Russian Presidential Press Secretary Dmitry Peskov told TASS.

Title: Israeli Airstrikes in Gaza Kill 28 More, Death Toll Surges to 43,764
Description: Islam Times - The death toll in Gaza climbed significantly, with 28 Palestinians killed in Israeli airstrikes over the last 24 hours, the Health Ministry in the besieged territory reported Friday, as mediation efforts for a cease-fire remain stalled.

Title: Protests Erupt at Oxford Over Nikki Haley’s Support for 'Israeli' Aggression

Title: Islamic Resistance in Iraq Continues Drone Strikes against 'Israel'

The operations, carried out in the early hours of Saturday, involved unmanned aerial vehicles [UAVs] and targeted a 'vital facility' within the occupied city.

Title: EU’s Borrell Calls for Sanctions on 'Israel' Over War Crimes

Title: Pakistan Has Always Called for a Ceasefire in Gaza and Lebanon: Pakistan COAS

Title: IDF Crisis: Soldier Shortage Deepens, 800 Casualties Loom

Title: World Bank: Israeli Aggression Incurs $8.5bn in Economic Loss on Lebanon

Title: Japanese Princess Yuriko Dies at 101

Title: Iran’s Larijani Due in Lebanon after Syria Visit

Title: Israel Kills Paramedics, Rescuers in Lebanon Attacks

Title: 2 Dead in Suspected Explosion in Germany

Title: Dutch People’s Unforgettable Lesson to Israelis

Title: US Appeals Court Reverses $1.68 Billion Judgment against Iran's Central Bank

Description: Islam Times - Director-General of the International Atomic Energy Agency (IAEA), Rafael Grossi, met with Abbas Araghchi, Foreign Minister of the Islamic Republic of Iran, on Thursday during his visit to Tehran, where the two engaged in talks.

Title: Violence in Amsterdam Anti-Semitism or Anti-Zionism?

Title: BRICS Offered Turkey Partner Country Status, Turkish Trade Minister Says

Title: Republicans Win 218 US House Seats, Giving Donald Trump, Party Control of Government
Description: Islam Times - Republicans have won enough seats to control the US House, completing the party’s sweep into power and securing their hold on US government alongside US President-elect Donald Trump.

Description: Islam Times - Containing China will be a priority task for the United States under Donald Trump, while Washington views Russia as a 'present-day threat,' Russian Foreign Minister Sergey Lavrov said.

Description: Islam Times - A letter from Hezbollah’s Secretary General Sheikh Naim Qassem to the Mujahidin of the Islamic Resistance
